title.bibl: Sichovi Visty, April 1921. Chicago District Siege Organization Announces Two Picnics

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

div.bibl: Sichovi Visty (Siege News), April 1921. CHICAGO DISTRICT SIEGE ORGANIZATION ANNOUNCES TWO PICNICS

body.p: The Chicago district Siege organization announces that it will hold two grand picnics, the first on June 19 and the second on July 4, 1921.
Therefore, we ask all the Ukrainian societies, associations, and sodalities, in Greater Chicago, to refrain from having any doings on the above mentioned days. Thanks.
